articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: US retail spending plunged last month, falling for the first time since August - CNN
articles.description: American shoppers pulled back on their spending last month for the first time since August as stubborn inflation continued to bite and harsh weather curbed economic activity.
articles.content:
